title: [QUESTION] SVG Export
body:
Hello,

I have been reading the documentation on SkiaSharp and I have seen a lot of information on how to read an SVG file and render it to the canvas but I haven't been able to find concrete information about saving/exporting a rendered image (or canvas) to an SVG file. Is this functionality supported or is there any plans to be supported in the future?

Thanks a lot for the help in advance,
